flawed_nl_solution:
In two years, Lennon will be 2+8 = <<2+8=9>>9 years old.
Ophelia will be 4*9 = <<4*9=36>>36 years old in two years.
Currently, Ophelia is 36-2 = <<36-2=34>>34 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
